item.title: Translations
item.description:
Although we try very hard to keep the english translation as complete as possible currently the 'native' language of the Workbench is german.
If you want to see a better english translation or another language to be supported by POLYMAP3 then please volunteer to help with this or any other part of the development. Thanks.

intro.description: The Workbench is the control center of POLYMAP3. It allows to manage all aspects of the projects, layers, geospatial data and services. You can read more about the Polymap project at: www.polymap.org
